sentences.sContent: John Harrison, a working-class joiner with relatively little education eventually won the prize after building a series of clocks, each improving on the previous one.
sentences.sContent_eng: John Harrison, a working-class joiner with relatively little education eventually won the prize after building a series of clocks, each improving on the previous one.
sentences.sCn: 一个毫不起眼、没有受过多少教育的工匠，约翰·哈里森，最终凭借一系列的发明创造和不断改良，最终获得了这笔丰厚的奖金。

words.tran: 共同的；连接的；联合的，合办的
关节；接缝；接合处，接合点；（牛，羊等的腿）大块肉
[木] 细木工业；细木工制品
接洽人；接合物；刨接缝的长刨
连接，贴合；接合；使有接头

trans.tranOther: someone who makes wooden doors, window frames etc
